meta.title: Welcome to South Knox School Corporation | South Knox School Corporation

div.p: 6116 East State Road 61 • Vincennes, Indiana 47591 • Phone: (812) 726-4440 • Fax: (812) 743-2110

div.h2: Welcome to South Knox School Corporation

div.p: It is our hope that you are able to gain some knowledge about our school system. By reviewing this information, it is believed you will determine we have a great school system where students, parents and community blend together to provide opportunities for everyone to grow in all aspects of their lives. Welcome to South Knox School Corporation's Web site. Thanks for visiting and have a great day!

h3.strong: South Knox School Corporation Board of Trustees

hr.h3:
South Knox Elementary begins 8:25 a.m.; dismissal at 3:10 p.m.
South Knox Middle/High school begins 8:20 a.m.; dismissal at 3:20 p.m.

ul.li: SKE before school (7:30 a.m. - 8:05 a.m.) child care/no cost to parents
SKE after school (3:10 p.m. - 6:00 p.m.) child care for elementary students at the Vincennes YMCA. Contact YMCA at 812-886-9077
Caring and experienced teaching, support, and administrative staff
Excellent learning areas for students - large, modern air-conditioned classrooms

li.strong: Students can graduate with up to 31 college credits

p.span: **Following are the instructions to access Harmony to review your student's
grades, attendance and discipline records from your home via the Internet.

**These Instructions can also be found on our Web page.**This program is best viewed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 or above and requires Javascript 1.1 or higher.**This program will launch a new window to view/print reports, disable "Pop-Up" blockers for the program to work properly.=========================TO ACCESS HARMONY
To access the elementary school Harmony parent portal for students, click on the following link, you will then be prompted to put in your username and password.

1. Go to the South Knox School Corporation Web page.http://www.sknox.k12.in.us/(OR https://harmony.sknox.k12.in.us to login - skip to #4)2. Click on the harmony link at the bottom of the page3. Click on the Harmony link.4. A Harmony School Management login screen will open. Enter your user name and password and click "login"5. You will be welcomed to Harmony and may click on the links on the left side of the screen to view your student's information.
When you are finished reviewing your student's academic record, please
click "Log Out" to log out of the system.
